release_note: Dear Livescribers We ve made some improvements to our app focusing on MyScript and reported bugs related to iOS 16. Hope you enjoy the new update and please leave us feedback on how we re doing so that we can continue to improve. Thank you. Team Livescribe.
Dear Livescribers We heard you loud and clear and fixed some bugs occurring on the latest iOS. Please let us know how we re doing by reaching out to us at Livescribe.customerservice anoto.com

Dear Livescribers We ve done some maintenance work on our app to make sure all updates are supported. As always we appreciate your support and feel free to drop us a line: livescribe.customerservice anoto.com Thanks! Team Livescribe

Dear Livescribers We heard you loud and clear! We are releasing a mandatory firmware update for our echo 2 smartpen to address some bugs that were reported to us. Thank you for your support and please send us your feedback at

New Firmware Update! We re sharing a few updates to make Livescribe better! New mandatory firmware update will address customers experiencing high sensitivity when writing with the new echo 2 smartpen. New firmware also improves audio recording and playback quality. Thank you for your support and please send us your feedback at Livescribe.customerservice anoto.com
Dear Livescribers We re so excited to launch the echo 2! We hope you enjoy it as much as we do. We made some changes to the app to support our latest smartpen.

We zapped some bugs and added cool new convenient features to make your writing journey easy. We were also highly caffeinated. Got any cool suggestions for the app Send us an email! We d love to hear from you.

We zapped some bugs and added awesome new features! If you like the new updates give us a 5 star review. It tells us that our all nighters are worthwhile. Got any cool suggestions for the app Send us an email! We d love to hear from you.

Reach out to us with your comments feedback and suggestions at livescribe.customerservice anoto.com.

What s fixed or improved Unexpected app crash events that happened while importing opening Livescribe Pencast PDF files and new smartpen registration was fixed. Reach out to us with your comments feedback and suggestions at livescribe.customerservice anoto.com.

What s New Support for the new Livescribe 2020 Planner Journal. Time to take notes make plans track goals and have a digital version with you any time any day. What s Fixed Improved support for iOS 13 Improved smartpen information UI screen to help users easily access and change key smartpen settings Fixed and made improvements to UI related issues when the App is switched to landscape mode Fixed issues related to icons displayed in the app when used with iPhone 7 Plus Fixed the issue where a pencast from an archived notebook starts playing automatically when users write in the same page of new notebook with same dot pattern Tuned up the app and made a lot of under the hood improvements to fix unexpected app crash issues and make the app more stable than the last version We heard you fixed bugs and improved app performance based on your feedback. Help make this app better by reaching out to us at livescribe.customerservice anoto.com.

What s New Progress bar to show smartpen sync status and progress Easy to access shortcuts on side panel for some key App features What s Fixed Fixed unexpected app crashes when selecting Reminders List importing Pencasts or Livescribe PDF files Improved messaging related to archiving notebooks when users are close to finishing a notebook Fixed issues related to sharing feeds directly to cloud connections like Google Drive Improved status indicators for notebookd when they are archived and auto send enabled We at Livescribe have heard your feedback fixed bugs and improved app performances. Continue to help make this app better by reaching out to us with your feedback and feature requests at livescribe.customerservice anoto.com

What s Fixed We ve made some more minor under the hood changes changes to make the App more stable and better than the last version. Reach out to us with your questions feature requests comments etc. at livescribe.customerservice anoto.com.

What s New Support for the new improved Aegir FW v2.3.4.2 Auto sending notes to your OneNote account in PDF format will now include a page preview being added to each page Access to Livescribe s Knowledge base articles directly from the App Ability to reach Livescribe CS team directly from the App What s Fixed Fixed unexpected App crashes during Pencast recording for certain users Tweaked the way Aegir pen connects with the App via Bluetooth to make the whole experience simple reliable and easy to use Recording and tagging controls had to be tapped twice sometimes for them to be activated while using Aegir. This has been fixed and all it takes is just a single tap to start stop recording from paper or be organized by tagging important notes We ve tuned up notebook sharing experience. One notebook or multiple notebooks sharing or syncing with your preferred cloud service is easier than before We ve worked on your inputs and made several under the hood performance improvements. Reach out to us with your questions features requests comments etc. at livevescribe.customerservice anoto.com

The Livescribe App is getting an upgrade! You ll notice a new UI scheme animated on boarding tutorials and a lot of other under the hood performance enhancements and bug fixes with this release. We at Livescribe have heard your feedback fixed bugs and improved app performances. Continue to help make this app better by reaching out to us with your feedback and feature requests at livescribe.customerservice anoto.com

We ve been hard at work making a slew of tune ups to improve Bluetooth connectivity and app stability. App now supports the newest Aegir editions and latest firmware that has a lot of under the hood performance improvements. Thus making the App a perfect match with Livescribe Smartpens. SPOILER ALERT unlike GoT the only thing that gets killed here are bugs : We ve worked on the App to ensure that this works well with Livescribe Smartpens and our other new applications . The first time you connect your Aegir with this version of the Livescribe App the pen s firmware will be updated automatically We heard you fixed bugs and improved app performance based on your feedback. Help make this app better by reaching out to us with your feedback and feature requests at livescribe.customerservice anoto.com

What s fixed or improved Stroke rendering in the app is improved. Watching your handwritten notes appear instantly on your device is a joy and we are making it better constantly. We ve tuned up Pencast playback performance. Recreating key moments is smoother than before. Transcribed text can now be edited and copied for sharing. Unexpected app freeze bug fixed. Various other bug fixes and stability improvements. Improved support for iOS 11 and iOS 12. What s new Support for new Livescribe notebooks
Updated the customer support chat link

Enhanced stability and performance Improved iOS 11 compatibility Revised UI for full iPhone X support Sharper page previews on iPad Pro and iPhone X Smoother zoom animations Pen synchronization changes Other bug fixes and minor UX refinements Improved the PDF import functionality

Improved iOS 11 compatibility Revised the UI for full iPhone X support Sharper looking page previews on iPad Pro and iPhone X New smooth animations for zooming pages in and out Improved the app stability and performaance Fixed pen synchronization issues that sometimes caused missing pages Other multiple bug fixes and minor UX improvements
Improved stability
General improvements to UI and stability Improvements to pen management and overall performance Miscellaneous bug fixes Support for newer iOS devices

Livescribe is faster smoother and sharper thanks to a massive under the hood rebuild. Live strokes appear on screen as you draw no more lag . Makes for great presentations throw your overhead projector away! Full page and full notebook transcriptions allow you to share all your notes as plain text. Brand new all vector rendering makes for razor sharp notes and pages on screen perfectly printed pages and better looking and smaller PDFs. New SVG sharing makes it easy to share your artwork and notes on the Web. Import shared pages or snippets into Adobe Illustrator or any other vector drawing app and work directly with your own hand drawn artwork. Paper to vector path is an industry first! Play back your pencasts anywhere by saving to video. Then use iMovie or any other video editor to easily create great lectures and presentations. Smarter search makes it easier to find your notes in Livescribe . Searchable PDFs make it easy everywhere else. Plus many performance improvements and stability fixes and optimizations for iOS 10.
Compatibility fix for iOS 10
